title: The War of Independence
itunes:title: The War of Independence
itunes:subtitle: Andrew Lambert discusses the War of 1812 between Britain and the USA, and we talk to Kishore Rao, director of the UNESCO World Heritage Centre.
description:
Andrew Lambert discusses the War of 1812 between Britain and the USA, and we talk to Kishore Rao, director of the UNESCO World Heritage Centre.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
